Hi,

profile =
settings page of the administration interface. 
but changes are not saved i=
nto the order.xml file after clicking
"Finished". 

checking the ctime of t=
he order file, it seems to be deleted and
rewritten when i clicked the "Fin=
ished". trying by changing every

d not manage to get the

written as
